plot: In uncertain times you need to look for a light. Jaume falls in love for Carla, a Portuguese girl that is visiting Barcelona. But Jaume's rigid father is more concerned about his son finding a good job than for his feelings and happiness.
title: El despertar de Jaume
plot_es: In uncertain times you need to look for a light. Jaume falls in love for Carla, a Portuguese girl that is visiting Barcelona. But Jaume's rigid father is more concerned about his son finding a good job than for his feelings and happiness.
plot_en: In uncertain times you need to look for a light. Jaume falls in love for Carla, a Portuguese girl that is visiting Barcelona. But Jaume's rigid father is more concerned about his son finding a good job than for his feelings and happiness.
